meanings.definition: A member of the Salvation Army.
meanings.sent1: The salvationists gathered to help the community in need.
meanings.sent2: Many salvationists volunteer their time to assist those less fortunate.
meanings.sent3: The salvationists organized a bake sale to raise funds for charity.
meanings.sent4: She was a salvationist in the battle against poverty.
meanings.sent5: The group of salvationists wore their uniforms proudly as they marched in the parade.

meanings.definition: A person who believes in or advocates for salvation.
meanings.sent1: As a salvationist, he preached about the importance of redemption.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a strong salvationist, always spreading messages of hope.
meanings.sent3: The salvationist shared uplifting stories to inspire others.
meanings.sent4: In her heart, she was a true salvationist, seeking to bring light to those in darkness.
meanings.sent5: The young girl grew up to be a dedicated salvationist, guiding others towards spiritual growth.
